name: Magnetic Unknown
description:
A 7 chapter Visual Novel that follows the story of 8 Explorers and their adventure through the Worlds Within Universe. The story follows Sabrina as she navigates life in space, with the crew as they are terraforming a new planet. This story gives background and insight into Worlds Within, the characters, creatures, and tech that make up the universe.  

This is an work in progress for us that will be improved over time I hope you all like it. I know its not the traditional style projects out there but this is one of our right releases.
